name: 3D Rally Racing
description:
Do you like Colin McRae Rally or WRC? Then you must try 3D World Rally Racing! This car game will bring you to the real world of rally racing. You can choose between different rally cars including Group B vehicles! Test your rally skills across different world locations like Usa, Sweden, Australia, Japan, Romania and many more.

Features:
- Realistic cars handling
- Speed, Acceleration, Brake and Handling can be improved by updating car level
- Visual car damage that affects handling
- Amateur and Professional Difficulties
- 3 different types of winning medals
- Realistic rally tracks
- Beat Time Challenge
- Smooth Gameplay
- Car simulator
- 3D Rally

And a lot of other features that you will discover while playing.

Enjoy and Have Fun!
